welcome.title: Welcome to Fortune Trader
welcome.disclaimer: This is a stock trader simulator game set in a world where fortune cookies actually predict the future. All money and trades in this game are fictional. Please do not gamble or risk real money if in your world cookies work differently.

login.title: Baker's Bank
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to continue
login.hint: This is not real banking information

sync.title: Syncing Data...
sync.message: Securing your previous session to cloud

banker.title: Baker's Bank
banker.loanUnavailableEarnings: Unavailable - You need lifetime earnings to get a loan
banker.loanUnavailableActive: Unavailable - You already have an active loan

locked.hint: Deposit money from Baker's Bank first

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.warning: Adjust your lifestyle spending using +/- buttons. Minimum values shown. Charged daily at midnight!

shop.title: List shop
shop.hint: Estate and cars eliminate daily expenses. Luxury items are just for show!

micro_flat.name: City Micro-Apartment
micro_flat.description: Small owned flat in an urban area. Eliminates rent expense.

new_build_flat.name: New-Build City Apartment
new_build_flat.description: Modern new-build apartment in a prime district. Eliminates rent expense.

family_house.name: Detached Family House (Outskirts)
family_house.description: Detached house with garden outside the city core. Eliminates rent expense.

villa_estate.name: Prestige Villa Estate
villa_estate.description: High-end villa with land and privacy. Eliminates rent expense.

compact_used.name: Used Compact Car
compact_used.description: Basic used car for everyday driving. Eliminates transport expense.

performance_car.name: Performance Coupe
performance_car.description: Quick, loud, and attention-grabbing. Eliminates transport expense.

executive_vehicle.name: Executive Luxury Vehicle
executive_vehicle.description: Premium comfort and status. Eliminates transport expense.

exotic_supercar.name: Exotic Supercar
exotic_supercar.description: Extreme performance and prestige. Eliminates transport expense.

fine_jewelry.name: Fine Jewelry Set
fine_jewelry.description: Precious metals and stones. Flashy but classic.

tailored_wardrobe.name: Tailored Wardrobe Upgrade
tailored_wardrobe.description: Custom-fit clothing collection. Look like money.

original_art.name: Original Contemporary Artwork
original_art.description: Original piece from a respected artist. Conversation starter.

motor_yacht.name: Motor Yacht (25m Class)
motor_yacht.description: Private yacht for serious leisure and flex.

private_jet.name: Private Jet (Light-Class)
private_jet.description: Private air travel. Ultimate convenience and prestige.

settings.title: Settings
settings.resetGameDesc: Clear all data and start over
settings.creator: Creator

leaderboard.title: Best Traders
leaderboard.subtitle: Top performers of the season
leaderboard.noPlayers: No players on the leaderboard yet.

phoneHint: Press ESC to toggle phone during gameplay

cookie.noCookies: No cookies yet. Purchase some above!
cookie.dragCookie: Drag a cookie here to unpack its prophecy
cookie.stockUnlockRequired: Purchase "Stock Trading Unlock" upgrade to unlock stock trading
cookie.marginUnlockRequired: Purchase "Margin Trading Unlock" upgrade to unlock margin trading
cookie.closeMarginFirst: Close your current margin position first
cookie.positionLockedMsg: Position is still locked. Wait for the timer to finish.

news.title: Market News
news.empty: No news yet. Market updates will appear here.
news.tabUnlockRequired: Purchase "News Tab Unlock" upgrade to access news
news.consoleUnlockRequired: Purchase "Console Tab Unlock" upgrade to access console

bots.alreadyExists: {{name}} already exists. Only one bot per strategy allowed.

deals.title: Active Prophecies
deals.empty: No active prophecies. Purchase a fortune cookie to receive trading insights.

modals.resetText: This will reset your bank balance to $1,000 and permanently delete ALL saved data for this login/password pair from both your device and cloud storage. This action cannot be undone.
modals.gameOverMessage: You have less than $50 in your bank account and less than $50 in your trading account. {{reason}} Your trading journey has come to an end.
modals.gameOverReasonLoan: You already have an active loan and cannot get another one.
modals.gameOverReasonNoEarnings: You have no lifetime earnings, so no loan is available (loan amount = lifetime earnings).
modals.gameOverReasonNone: No loans are available to you.
modals.gameOverQuestion: Would you like to restart and try again?
modals.prestigeText: Transfer your portfolio to your bank account and start a new trading round.

notifications.wrongPassword: Password is wrong for this name.
notifications.alreadyHaveLoan: You already have an active loan.
notifications.needEarningsForLoan: You need lifetime earnings to get a loan.
notifications.loanApproved: Loan approved for ${{amount}} at {{rate}}% per week!
notifications.insufficientRepay: Insufficient bank balance to repay loan.

loan.name: Loan
loan.description: Loan amount based on your lifetime earnings

predictionZone1.name: Chart Prediction Zone I
predictionZone1.description: Bigger white zone when betting on price in next 10 ticks

predictionZone2.name: Chart Prediction Zone II
predictionZone2.description: Even bigger prediction zone for easier wins

botBetTier1.name: Bot Bet Tier I
botBetTier1.description: Bots use 25% of your bet amount

botBetTier2.name: Bot Bet Tier II
botBetTier2.description: Bots use 50% of your bet amount

botBetTier3.name: Bot Bet Tier III
botBetTier3.description: Bots use 100% of your bet amount

cookieStockHint.name: Cookie Stock Hint
cookieStockHint.description: Shows stock name hint on undecoded cookies

cookieProphecyHint.name: Cookie Prophecy Hint
cookieProphecyHint.description: Shows prophecy type hint on undecoded cookies

trendUp: {{stock}} shows strong upward momentum as investors show confidence
Analysts detect bullish signals in {{stock}} trading patterns
{{stock}} gains traction with positive market sentiment
Investors flock to {{stock}} amid positive market outlook
trendDown: {{stock}} faces selling pressure as market sentiment shifts
Analysts note bearish indicators in {{stock}} performance
Investors show caution as {{stock}} trends lower
volatility: High volatility detected in {{stock}} trading session
Traders brace for volatility as {{stock}} shows erratic movement
{{stock}} sees heightened trading activity and price swings
general: Market analysts release new report on {{stock}}
Breaking: Major development affects {{stock}} market position
Market watchers keep close eye on {{stock}} performance
